org.openimaj.tools.faces

Class FaceSimilarityTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.tools.faces.FaceSimilarityTool

  • public class FaceSimilarityTool
extends Object
    Face similarity tool compares the faces in all given images and gives a score for each comparison. The tool can be made to match only the first image against all other images or comparing all images against all others.

    This tool can be used both from the command-line and programmatically. Programmatically, there are some convenience functions for comparing Lists of Files and lists of FImages, however, you are welcome to give the getDistances(List, boolean, ImageGetter, FaceSimilarityEngine) method any List as long as you supply an FaceSimilarityTool.ImageGetter that can return FImages from that list.

    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    Created:
    30 May 2011

        public FaceSimilarityTool()

    • Method Detail

      • getDistances

        public Map<String,Map<String,Double>> getDistances(File first,
                                                   List<File> others,
                                                   FaceSimilarityEngine<?,?,FImage> strategy)
        Calculates the distance between all the faces in the first image with all the faces in the given images. Faces are identified by their image file and the index into the file, so if an image does not contain any faces, it will return null from the map for that filename.
        Parameters:
        first - The query image
        others - The list of files to compare against
        strategy - The strategy
        Returns:
        A Map giving the distance of every face with every other.

      • getDistances

        public Map<String,Map<String,Double>> getDistances(List<File> inputFiles,
                                                   FaceSimilarityEngine<?,?,FImage> strategy)
        Calculates the distance between faces in the given images. Faces are identified by their image file and the index into the file, so if an image does not contain any faces, it will return null from the map for that filename.
        Parameters:
        inputFiles - The list of files to process
        strategy - the strategy
        Returns:
        A Map giving the distance of every face with every other.

      • getDistances

        public Map<String,Map<String,Double>> getDistances(List<File> inputFiles,
                                                   boolean withFirst,
                                                   FaceSimilarityEngine<?,?,FImage> strategy)
        Calculates the distance between faces in the given images. Faces are identified by their image file and the index into the file, so if an image does not contain any faces, it will return null from the map for that filename.
        Parameters:
        inputFiles - The list of files to process
        withFirst - if TRUE, the first image in the list will be matched against all others, otherwise all images are matches against each other.
        strategy - The strategy
        Returns:
        A Map giving the distance of every face with every other.

      • getDistances

        public Map<String,Map<String,Double>> getDistances(List<String> imageIdentifiers,
                                                   List<FImage> inputImages,
                                                   boolean withFirst,
                                                   FaceSimilarityEngine<?,?,FImage> strategy)
        Calculates the distance between faces in the given images. Faces are identified by their image file and the index into the file, so if an image does not contain any faces, it will return null from the map for that filename.
        Parameters:
        imageIdentifiers - A list of image names
        inputImages - The list of images to process
        withFirst - if TRUE, the first image in the list will be matched against all others, otherwise all images are matches against each other.
        strategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        A Map giving the distance of every face with every other.

      • getDistances

        public <T> Map<String,Map<String,Double>> getDistances(List<T> inputList,
                                                       boolean withFirst,
                                                       FaceSimilarityTool.ImageGetter<T> iGetter,
                                                       FaceSimilarityEngine<?,?,FImage> strategy)
        This is the actual comparison function that performs the nested loops as necessary to match all the faces against each other.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of thing in the input list
        Parameters:
        inputList - A list of things to process
        withFirst - Whether to compare the first against all others (TRUE) or compare all against each other (FALSE)
        iGetter - The getter that can make FImages from the input list.
        strategy - The strategy
        Returns:
        A Map giving the distance of every face with every other.
